text: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ

translation.en.sahih: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
translation.id.indonesian: sambil menundukkan pandangan-pandangan mereka keluar dari kuburan seakan-akan mereka belalang yang beterbangan
